Summary: BRIGHT LIGHTS IN THE SKY - Turned sky weird white blue color--strange.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Evesham Township
There were no other sightings in Evesham Township on or around January 6th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsLast nite while laying in my bed with the Television on watching the History Channel at about 9:25pm I saw a very strange out of this world type of glow which illuminated the entire sky for about 5 or so seconds. This happened 2x. Ironically, I did some research and people from other parts of NJ reported the same type of event. My event happened in South Jersey, 18 miles East of Philadelphia in Marlton, NJ. It was also sleeting outside, but no way was it lightning. I got up and stood at the window and looked for whatever it was. I couldn't see anything, because it was above the clouds. Whatever it was, it illuminated the clouds and lit of the entire area. Thanks! Jay
